Description: Bowl and tondo sherd of Attic black-figured pottery cup, perhaps a Siana cup; interior, from outside: glazed wall; tondo border consisting of pairs of three black lines framing band of two rows of dots; trace of frieze inside; exterior: black-figure decoration in handle zone consisting of horse's hoof, to left, on narrow black band; glazed black zone below with two black lines at bottom of sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0396) (Phase 1)
